title: Terry Pluto: Coach Dean Smith's legacy transcends the court
teaser: Dean Smith is being remembered as an iconic college basketball coach whose approach to the game and his players transcended the court. The Hall of Famer died this past weekend at age 83. He coached North Carolina for 36 seasons, winning two national titles. WKSU commentator Terry Pluto interviewed Smith in 1993, when he worked for the Beacon Journal. He says it was an unforgettable experience. WKSU's Amanda Rabinowitz reports.
